content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with a story from Sherlock Holmes this week. We hear The Adventure Of The Uddington Witch, his tale from October 31, 1948.

(29:12) The Crime Club brings us our second mystery. From March 13, 1947, we’ll hear Fear Came First.

Download CaseClosed735

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
